normalized: …and then.

name: murasaki
normalized: it, it's no good…!

name: kiryuu
normalized: guu?!
m, murasaki?!
while staggering directly backward, kiryuu's voice broke into falsetto.
both of murasaki's arms had pushed kiryuu's chest away.

name: kiryuu
normalized: wh, why?!
why do you reject me?!
at the last moment…!

name: murasaki
normalized: at this point… there's no way i could believe you!

name: kiryuu
normalized: kuh?!
murasaki!

name: murasaki
normalized: don't come near me!
as strong emotions had burst out, murasaki had rejected kiryuu with her entire body.
complete rejection, without reason…

name: kiryuu
normalized: calm down and think about it, murasaki!
listen, if i die, sakura will…!

name: ingrid
normalized: looks like negotiations have broken down, huh, kiryuu?
suddenly, ingrid stood before his eyes.

name: kiryuu
normalized: ii?!
ingri…!
in her hand was a longsword of black flame.

name: kiryuu
normalized: w, wait…!

name: ingrid
normalized: how unsightly.
to be betrayed by the woman you laid your hands on is a fitting end for you.

name: kiryuu
normalized: wha?!
hey, don't speak to me like…!
the moment before he finished talking, kiryuu's body had been cut in two.

name: kiryuu
normalized: oh, uu?!
the trail of her sword, which had travelled straight across his abdomen, was enveloped in black flame.
kiryuu had started burning up due to the jet-black, scorching heat in his upper and lower halves.
tremendous heat and pain assailed kiryuu.
however, in the end, he never perceived that.

name: kiryuu
normalized: wai, tt…
the flesh of his limbs came apart, turned into tentacles, and wrapped around ingrid's arms and legs.

name: ingrid
normalized: l, let go…!
kiryuu's lower half had already burned away.
but still, kiryuu tried to block off ingrid's movement with all the tentacles of his upper body, which still remained.

name: ingrid
normalized: kiryuu!
kuu, what are you trying to do…?!
apart from anyone else, kiryuu himself didn't understand.
for what reason was he performing such a futile act…?

name: kiryuu
normalized: （for what reason am i…?
the black flames reached as far as the top of his head, and just before his field of vision was swallowed into darkness, he saw murasaki, who had noticed that ingrid couldn't move, running away.
in the end, it seemed that he had even become unable to control the tumour.

name: ingrid
normalized: kuh?!
get off, kiryuu!
you…!
several impacts.
his remaining upper body was probably being chopped up by ingrid.
even during that time, kiryuu kept thinking.

name: kiryuu
normalized: （why, did i… why did i give murasaki time to escape…?
dark nothingness was enveloping kiryuu's consciousness, which remained at the end.
everything had come to nothing in the end, and, on the verge of disappearing, kiryuu felt like he had heard a cry from the youma that haunted his body.

name: kiryuu
normalized: （children… i see.
because of the six children of mine inside her womb…）
having understood, kiryuu tried to smile, but in the end, he was not able to do so.
